players.name: Bob
memory: Diana: "Charlie is the mafioso I investigated last night and they are a threat to us all."
You: "Charlie is the one who seems suspicious to me, let's keep an eye on him."
Diana: "Charlie is the mafioso I investigated last night and they are a threat to us all."
Charlie: "Charlie is still the mafioso, and I'm keeping an eye on him. Let's not let our guard down."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
